response.overview: Lessons of friendship lay at the fuzzy center of these six episodes from the animated series "ToddWorld," in which Todd, his dog Benny and pals live a whimsical life of fun and adventure. In this collection, Todd joins Stella's secret club; tries to communicate with an alien; finds himself in a bind when he has to select a best friend; gets a case of the itches; learns the importance of sharing; and discovers that sometimes it's OK to be afraid.
response.title: ToddWorld: Making New Friends: Vol. 3
